com.oceanoptics.omnidriver.features.dac

Interface AnalogDac


  • public interface AnalogDac
    This interface encapsulates functions in devices that have an internal DAC. This DAC is responsible for calibrating both gain (i.e. saturation level) and spectrum baseline offset. The DAC can be calibrated using counts or voltage levels.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
